text: Ashley Gardner is an American actress. She has done acting in movies, television, stage plays, and voice acting. She is best known for her role in voicing the characters Nancy Hicks-Gribble and Didi Hill in the animated sitcom King of the Hill. She has also voiced characters in Beavis and Butt- Head. Her first television role was as Marion in the Seinfeld episode "The Library". ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:20th-century American actors Category:21st-century American actors Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: Ashley Gardner
